attributes.action: reduce the annual salaries of the Chair of the BBC trust, the BBC Director General and the Controller of Radio 3 by £5 because of their self interested censorship of the Radio 3 Jazz Messageboard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Respected and frequent posters on the Radio 3 Jazz Messageboard have been barred from posting by the board's moderators. No reasons were given, but the posters were critical of the editorial policies and authority of Radio 3 and Something Else Productions, a principal contract provider to Radio 3 Jazz programmes.
This suppression of dissent is petty and irresponsible in a mature democracy and belittles the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
